its porofessor.gg

https://porofessor.gg/live/na/SwiftKitten88

( well u need to use your own summoner when your in game)

it's what i open in loading screen to get opponent data on my 2nd monitor.

 It's actaully REALLY useful, as so far it had predicted the enemy was going invade 100% of the times they did.

its made by the same people who do 

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/

who have a history of being unbiased and generally have the most accurate and extensive data out there. (unlike op.gg which ignores all data outside of plat + korea) 

i have fond some error on thier site. thier (match-ups) i generally find to be a "bit off".. but their still the most accurate site out there. and professor.gg is amazing
It looks useful I am going to use it.

Well, the first one could be you were playing at a time with a very low amount of players in Gold-Plat queues. Like late at night, etc. 

The 2nd one is Flex, so Solo/duo rank doesn't mean anything since the current rank of them in Flex was near your mmr.

I always just play from within 8-11 MST once the kids are in bed and before I sleep

Flex has always been a shitshow but still needs to be addressed. Just because someone is bronze solo and silver flex vs plat solo and silver flex, doesnt mean that it's silver vs silver level

actually that's exactly what it means. Not from a player perspective, but from the game's perspective. Filtering out ppl's solo ranks when playing flex would mean queue times are gonna be like 4 times longer
Just make it so your other ranks have an impact on placement within 1 tier so we dont have Diamond Solo in silver flex. Lowest they can place would be P5

It's matchups like Xin in the first image (trying to get through gold promos) that I never made it through my gold series.  Every time I'd make it in there, their team would have 2-3 platinums, and stomp my silver teammates.
I won that series 3-1 but every fucking game had 2-4 plats in it while in silver
